subject: Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Bruce Springsteen’s daughter, Jessica, bought a gold medal-winning horse from the London Olympics with hopes of competing in show jumping at the 2016 Games in Rio de Janeiro.
snippet: Bruce Springsteen’s daughter, Jessica, bought a gold medal-winning horse from the London Olympics with hopes of competing in show jumping at the 2016 Games in Rio de Janeiro.
